item.text: Therefore we must pay closer attention to what we have heard, so that we do not drift away.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoken</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1096">proved to be</st> so <st data-num="949" class="">firm</st> that <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="3847" class="">violation</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3876" class="">disobedience</st> <st data-num="2983" class="">received</st> its <st data-num="1738" class="">just</st> <st data-num="3405" class="">penalty</st>,

<st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> will <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1628" class="">escape</st> if we <st data-num="272" class="">neglect</st> <st data-num="5082">such a great</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st>? <st data-num="3748">It</st> was <st data-num="746" class="">first</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">communicated</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> and was <st data-num="950" class="">confirmed</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> those who <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> him,
while God confirmed their witness with signs and wonders and various miracles and gifts of the Holy Spirit distributed according to his will.
For he did not put the world to come, about which we are speaking, under the control of angels.

Instead someone testified somewhere:

“What is man that you think of him or the son of man that you care for him?

You made him lower than the angels for a little while.

You crowned him with glory and honor.

You put all things under his control.”

For when he put all things under his control, he left nothing outside of his control. At present we do not yet see all things under his control,

but we see Jesus, who was made lower than the angels for a little while, now crowned with glory and honor because he suffered death, so that by God’s grace he would experience death on behalf of everyone.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it was <st data-num="4241" class="">fitting</st> for <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1223" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st> exist,<n id="1" /> in <st data-num="71" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st>, to <st data-num="5048" class="">make</st> the <st data-num="747" class="">pioneer</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="5048" class="">perfect</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3804" class="">sufferings</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5037" class="">indeed</st> he who <st data-num="37" class="">makes holy</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those being <st data-num="37" class="">made holy</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> have the <st data-num="1537 1520">same origin</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="156" class="">so</st><n id="2" /> he is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1870" class="">ashamed</st> to <st data-num="2564" class="">call</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="3" />
saying, “I will proclaim your name to my brothers; in the midst of the assembly I will praise you.”
Again he says, “I will be confident in him,” and again, “Here I am, with the children God has given me.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="1893" class="">since</st> the <st data-num="3813" class="">children</st> <st data-num="2841">share in</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>, <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3898" class="">likewise</st> <st data-num="3348">shared in</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> humanity,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> he could <st data-num="2673" class="">destroy</st><n id="3" /> the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">holds</st> the <st data-num="2904" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> (<st data-num="3778">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, the <st data-num="1228">devil</st>),

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="525" class="">set free</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1777">held in</st> <st data-num="1397" class="">slavery</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> by their <st data-num="5401" class="">fear</st> of <st data-num="2288">death</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1222" class="">surely</st> his <st data-num="1949" class="">concern</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> for <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> he is <st data-num="1949" class="">concerned</st> for <st data-num="11">Abraham’s</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">descendants</st>.

<st data-num="3606" class="">Therefore</st> he <st data-num="3784" class="">had</st><n id="1" /> to be <st data-num="3666">made like</st> his <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every respect</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he could <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="1655" class="">merciful</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="749">high priest</st> in things relating <st data-num="4314">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2433">make atonement</st><n id="3" /> for the <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> of the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>.
For since he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are tempted.
